Variable.Name: InvalidLogin
Variable.Value: The login attempt failed: either the user ID or the password is invalid

Variable.Name: WorklistNewItemError
Variable.Value: it could not be attached at the selected location. Instead, it has been placed in your Newstuff folder

Variable.Name: ObjectNotReferencedByAnother
Variable.Value: This object is not referenced by another

Variable.Name: DeleteAllSequenceError
Variable.Value: The last revision of an Item cannot be independently deleted. Delete the Item object itself

Variable.Name: RemoveRevisionColumnError
Variable.Value: You may only show one revision relation. Please remove either revision or displayed revision from the show column

Variable.Name: InvalidSelection
Variable.Value: Selected BOM line, or lines, are not in the scope of the Context line selected.

Variable.Name: substituteTargetBOMline
Variable.Value: Target BOM line is not selected. Select a target BOM line to add the substitute.

Variable.Name: substitutepreferredBOMline
Variable.Value: Select a preferred bom line with substitutes.

Variable.Name: SearchFail
Variable.Value: Search failed to find any objects

Variable.Name: NothingOnClipboard
Variable.Value: Nothing on the clipboard to paste

Variable.Name: ReplaceSubstituteTargetBOMline
Variable.Value: Target BOM line is not selected. Select a target BOM line to replace.

Variable.Name: ReplaceSingleItemWithMultipleItems
Variable.Value: Multiple items in clip board. Cannot replace single item with multiple items.

Variable.Name: IDPatternIE
Variable.Value: The valid Naming Rule pattern is
